About Me

Let me tell you little about myself and what I do...

WHY DO I WANT TO START A CAREER IN WEB DEVELOPMENT?


My professional engagement from Mar 2013 - Feb 2020 has been as a owner for a technology-bases Small and Medium Enterprise based in Nepal, where I mostly had managerial duties.
During this time, I worked to provide software solutions paired with SMS services for our clients by working together with our team of software engineers and other members.

Being engaged in an IT business for a few years, I saw that with the use of “software-and-technology” several things related to operations, data collection, communications, and workflow could be made more efficient and robust.

This amazing possibility of software to create exciting systems, led me mainly to take interest in software engineering as a profession.
In 2019, I finally decided to change my career. This was not an easy decision. I gathered all the information possible from my research and consulted with professionals, whom I had gotten to know over the years. Then, I started to make the transition.

I learned several front-end technologies initially. I was fascinated by how much more the JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, Vue, etc. could do easily and quickly. Also, that JavaScript could be used as a server-side language. These technologies together with a database and APIs a could make a full-fledged web app. Thus, I decided to learn these programming languages to become a full-stack MERN Developer.
